ValidationRule.description: In order to enter a date in Sent to WC Underwriting, Load Holds Complete must have a date populated. Record Type ID used because this object is maxed out for object relationships. Can't get to the RT Name.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = '012700000001jeX' || RecordTypeId="0120g000000l3qD" , NOT(ISBLANK(Sent_to_WC_Underwriting__c )) , NOT(Previously_Sent_to_Underwriting__c) , ISBLANK(Load_Holds_Cleared__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Load Holds Cleared must have a date to be able to populate Sent to WC Underwriting.
